# Canadian Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3965999216
* **Publication Date**: April 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Solicitation Title (En)**: F3065-231001 Refit Spring 2023 Amundsen
* **Solicitation Title (Fr)**: F3065-231001 Radoub Printemps 2023 Amundsen
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity**: Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)

## Tender Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)
* **Contract Period**: May 15, 2023, to May 15, 2024
* **Attachments**: None

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Melanie Parent
* **Contact Email**: [melanie.parent@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.parent@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Information**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16018769?extsite=MTYwMTg3NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16018769?extsite=MTYwMTg3NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), invites qualified bidders to submit proposals for the refit of the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Amundsen, located in Quebec, QC. This contract is a requirement for the provision of ship repair work, which includes all necessary documentation and bid submission.

Bidders are required to submit their bid by 2:00 PM EST on May 10, 2023. Bids submitted after this date and time will be considered non-responsive. The contracting authority reserves the right to award the contract to the bidder who provides the lowest price.

For more information, please visit the contact information
